original_text: And Moses was not able to enter the tent of meeting because the cloud settled on it, and the glory of the Lord filled the tabernacle.
korean_text: 모세가 회막에 들어갈 수 없었으니 이는 구름이 회막 위에 덮이고 여호와의 영광이 성막에 충만함이었으며

sentences.original_text: And Moses was not able to enter the tent of meeting
because the cloud settled on it
and the glory of the Lord filled the tabernacle.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주의 영광이 성막을 가득 채웠습니다
